title: [LFT] Duo Bot Looking for Team Silver+
body: Hi, me and my mate are looking for a team, around high silver and gold just to try and earn the season rewards. We both play botlane and are available to play almost every night. If you have a team and would like to try us out, add me on league: Raguraki

replies.body:
Hey Raguraki

My two friends and I have been wanting to play ranked 5's for the season rewards as well. Us three play Top/Jungle/Mid respectively so a duo bot is what we're looking for.

IGN: The Wongai

Edit: I've sent you a friend request
